verses.verse: <S%H1945>Woe<s%> to <S%H740>Ariel!<s%> <S%H740>Ariel,<s%> the <S%H7151>city<s%> where <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H2583>encamped!<s%> <S%H5595>Add<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> to <S%H8141>year;<s%> let the <S%H2282>feasts<s%> come <S%H5362>around;<s%>
then I will <S%H6693>distress<s%> <S%H740>Ariel,<s%> and there will be <S%H8386>mourning<s%> and <S%H592>lamentation.<s%> She shall be to me as an altar <S%H740>hearth.<s%>

I will <S%H2583>encamp<s%> against you all <S%H1754>around<s%> <S%H6696>you,<s%> and will lay siege against you with posted <S%H4674>troops.<s%> I will <S%H6965>raise<s%> siege works against <S%H6965>you.<s%>

You will be brought <S%H8213>down,<s%> and will <S%H1696>speak<s%> out of the <S%H776>ground.<s%> Your <S%H565>speech<s%> will <S%H7817>mumble<s%> out of the <S%H6083>dust.<s%> Your <S%H6963>voice<s%> will be as of one who has a familiar <S%H178>spirit,<s%> out of the <S%H776>ground,<s%> and your <S%H565>speech<s%> will <S%H6850>whisper<s%> out of the <S%H6083>dust.<s%>

But the <S%H1995>multitude<s%> of your <S%H2114>foes<s%> will be like <S%H1851>fine<s%> <S%H80>dust,<s%> and the <S%H1995>multitude<s%> of the ruthless <S%H6184>ones<s%> like <S%H4671>chaff<s%> that blows <S%H5674>away.<s%> <S%H6621>Yes,<s%> it will be in an instant, <S%H6597>suddenly.<s%>

She will be <S%H6485>visited<s%> by <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> with <S%H7482>thunder,<s%> with <S%H7494>earthquake,<s%> with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6963>noise,<s%> with <S%H5492>whirlwind<s%> and <S%H5591>storm,<s%> and with the <S%H3851>flame<s%> of a <S%H398>devouring<s%> <S%H784>fire.<s%>

The <S%H1995>multitude<s%> of all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that <S%H6633>fight<s%> against <S%H740>Ariel,<s%> even all who <S%H6638>fight<s%> against her and her <S%H4685>stronghold,<s%> and who <S%H6693>distress<s%> <S%H2472>her,<s%> will be like a dream, a <S%H2377>vision<s%> of the <S%H3915>night.<s%>

It will be like when a <S%H7457>hungry<s%> man <S%H2492>dreams,<s%> and <S%H398>behold,<s%> he eats; but he <S%H6974>awakes,<s%> and his <S%H5315>hunger<s%> <S%H7386>isn't<s%> satisfied; or like <S%H834>when<s%> a thirsty <S%H6771>man<s%> <S%H2492>dreams,<s%> and <S%H8354>behold,<s%> he drinks; but he <S%H6974>awakes,<s%> and <S%H5889>behold,<s%> he is faint, and <S%H5315>he<s%> is still <S%H8264>thirsty.<s%> The <S%H1995>multitude<s%> of all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that <S%H6633>fight<s%> against <S%H2022>Mount<s%> Zion will be like <S%H6726>that.<s%>

<S%H4102>Pause<s%> and <S%H8539>wonder!<s%> <S%H8173>Blind<s%> yourselves and be <S%H8173>blind!<s%> They are <S%H7937>drunken,<s%> but not with <S%H3196>wine;<s%> they <S%H5128>stagger,<s%> but not with strong <S%H7941>drink.<s%>

For <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has poured <S%H5258>out<s%> on you a <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of deep <S%H8639>sleep,<s%> and has <S%H6105>closed<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets;<s%> and he has <S%H3680>covered<s%> your <S%H7218>heads,<s%> the <S%H2374>seers.<s%>

All <S%H2380>vision<s%> has become to you like the <S%H1697>words<s%> of a <S%H5612>book<s%> that is <S%H2856>sealed,<s%> which men <S%H5414>deliver<s%> to one who is <S%H3045>educated,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H7121>"Read<s%> <S%H559>this,<s%> please;" and he says, "I <S%H3201>can<s%>'t, for it is <S%H2856>sealed:<s%>"

and the <S%H5612>book<s%> is <S%H5414>delivered<s%> to one who is not <S%H3045>educated,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H7121>"Read<s%> <S%H559>this,<s%> please;" and he says, "I <S%H3045>can't<s%> read."

The <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3282>"Because<s%> this <S%H5971>people<s%> draws <S%H5066>near<s%> with their <S%H6310>mouth<s%> and with their <S%H8193>lips<s%> to <S%H3513>honor<s%> <S%H7368>me,<s%> but they have removed their <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H7368>far<s%> from <S%H3374>me,<s%> and their fear of me is a <S%H3925>commandment<s%> of <S%H582>men<s%> which has been <S%H3925>taught;<s%>

<S%H3254>therefore,<s%> behold, I will proceed to do a marvelous <S%H6381>work<s%> among this <S%H5971>people,<s%> even a marvelous <S%H6381>work<s%> and a <S%H6382>wonder;<s%> and the <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> of their <S%H2450>wise<s%> men will <S%H6>perish,<s%> and the <S%H998>understanding<s%> of their <S%H995>prudent<s%> men will be <S%H5641>hidden.<s%>"

<S%H1945>Woe<s%> to those who <S%H6009>deeply<s%> <S%H5641>hide<s%> their <S%H6098>counsel<s%> from <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and whose <S%H4639>works<s%> are in the <S%H4285>dark,<s%> and who <S%H559>say,<s%> "Who <S%H7200>sees<s%> <S%H3045>us?<s%>" and "Who knows us?"

You turn things upside <S%H2017>down!<s%> Should the <S%H3335>potter<s%> be <S%H2803>thought<s%> to be like <S%H2563>clay;<s%> that the thing <S%H6213>made<s%> should <S%H559>say<s%> about him who <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H6213>it,<s%> "He didn't make <S%H3336>me;<s%>" or the thing formed <S%H559>say<s%> of him who <S%H3335>formed<s%> <S%H995>it,<s%> "He has no understanding?"

<S%H4213>Isn't<s%> it yet a very little <S%H4592>while,<s%> and <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> will be <S%H7725>turned<s%> into a fruitful <S%H3759>field,<s%> and the fruitful <S%H3759>field<s%> will be <S%H2803>regarded<s%> as a <S%H3293>forest?<s%>

In that <S%H3117>day,<s%> the <S%H2795>deaf<s%> will <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H5612>book,<s%> and the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H5787>blind<s%> will <S%H7200>see<s%> out of <S%H652>obscurity<s%> and out of <S%H2822>darkness.<s%>

The <S%H6035>humble<s%> also will <S%H3254>increase<s%> their <S%H8057>joy<s%> in <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and the <S%H34>poor<s%> among <S%H120>men<s%> will <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> in the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

For the <S%H6184>ruthless<s%> is brought to <S%H656>nothing,<s%> and the <S%H3887>scoffer<s%> <S%H3615>ceases,<s%> and all those who are <S%H8245>alert<s%> to do <S%H205>evil<s%> are cut <S%H3772>off<s%>â€”

who cause a <S%H120>person<s%> to be <S%H2398>indicted<s%> by a <S%H1697>word,<s%> and lay a <S%H6983>snare<s%> for the <S%H3198>arbiter<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> and who <S%H5186>deprive<s%> the <S%H6662>innocent<s%> of justice with false <S%H8414>testimony.<s%>

Therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> who <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> concerning the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob:<s%> <S%H3290>"Jacob<s%> shall no longer be <S%H954>ashamed,<s%> neither shall his <S%H6440>face<s%> grow <S%H2357>pale.<s%>

But when he <S%H7200>sees<s%> his <S%H3206>children,<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of my <S%H3027>hands,<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of <S%H6942>him,<s%> they will sanctify my <S%H8034>name.<s%> <S%H6942>Yes,<s%> they will sanctify the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and will stand in <S%H6206>awe<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
They also who <S%H8582>err<s%> in <S%H7307>spirit<s%> will <S%H3045>come<s%> to <S%H998>understanding,<s%> and those who <S%H7279>grumble<s%> will <S%H3925>receive<s%> <S%H3948>instruction.<s%>"
